00079 void Micropolis::doZone(const Position &pos)
00080 {
00081     // Set Power Bit in Map from powerGridMap
00082     bool zonePowerFlag = setZonePower(pos);
00083 
00084 
00085     if (zonePowerFlag) {
00086         poweredZoneCount++;
00087     } else {
00088         unpoweredZoneCount++;
00089     }
00090 
00091     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00092 
00093     // Do special zones.
00094     if ((tile > PORTBASE) &&
00095         (tile < CHURCH1BASE)) {
00096         doSpecialZone(pos, zonePowerFlag);
00097         return;
00098     }
00099 
00100     // Do residential zones.
00101     if (tile < HOSPITAL) {
00102         doResidential(pos, zonePowerFlag);
00103         return;
00104     }
00105 
00106     // Do hospitals and churches.
00107     if ((tile < COMBASE) ||
00108         ((tile >= CHURCH1BASE) &&
00109          (tile <= CHURCH7LAST))) {
00110         doHospitalChurch(pos);
00111         return;
00112     }
00113 
00114     // Do commercial zones.
00115     if (tile < INDBASE)  {
00116         doCommercial(pos, zonePowerFlag);
00117         return;
00118     }
00119 
00120     // Do industrial zones.
00121     if (tile < CHURCH1BASE) {
00122         doIndustrial(pos, zonePowerFlag);
00123         return;
00124     }
00125 
00126     printf("UNEXPOECTED ZONE: %d !!!\n", tile);
00127 }
00128 
00133 void Micropolis::doHospitalChurch(const Position &pos)
00134 {
00135     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00136 
00137     if (tile == HOSPITAL) {
00138 
00139         hospitalPop++;
00140 
00141         if (!(cityTime & 15)) {
00142             repairZone(pos, HOSPITAL, 3);
00143         }
00144 
00145         if (needHospital == -1) { // Too many hospitals!
00146             if (!getRandom(20)) {
00147                 zonePlop(pos, RESBASE); // Remove hospital.
00148             }
00149         }
00150 
00151     } else if ((tile == CHURCH0) ||
00152                (tile == CHURCH1) ||
00153                (tile == CHURCH2) ||
00154                (tile == CHURCH3) ||
00155                (tile == CHURCH4) ||
00156                (tile == CHURCH5) ||
00157                (tile == CHURCH6) ||
00158                (tile == CHURCH7)) {
00159 
00160         churchPop++;
00161 
00162         //printf("CHURCH %d %d %d %d\n", churchPop, pos.posX, pos.posY, tile);
00163 
00164         bool simulate = true;
00165 
00166         if (!(cityTime & 15)) {
00167             repairZone(pos, tile, 3);
00168         }
00169 
00170         if (needChurch == -1) { // Too many churches!
00171             if (!getRandom(20)) {
00172                 zonePlop(pos, RESBASE); // Remove church.
00173                 simulate = false;
00174             }
00175         }
00176 
00177         if (simulate) {
00178             //printf("SIM %d %d %d\n", pos.posX, pos.posY, tile);
00179 
00180             int churchNumber = 0;
00181             
00182             switch (tile) {
00183                 case CHURCH0:
00184                     churchNumber = 0;
00185                     break;
00186                 case CHURCH1:
00187                     churchNumber = 1;
00188                     break;
00189                 case CHURCH2:
00190                     churchNumber = 2;
00191                     break;
00192                 case CHURCH3:
00193                     churchNumber = 3;
00194                     break;
00195                 case CHURCH4:
00196                     churchNumber = 4;
00197                     break;
00198                 case CHURCH5:
00199                     churchNumber = 5;
00200                     break;
00201                 case CHURCH6:
00202                     churchNumber = 6;
00203                     break;
00204                 case CHURCH7:
00205                     churchNumber = 7;
00206                     break;
00207                 default:
00208                     assert(0); // Unexpected church tile
00209                     break;
00210             }
00211 
00212             callback("simulateChurch", "ddd", pos.posX, pos.posY, churchNumber);
00213         }
00214 
00215     }
00216 
00217 }

00220 #define ASCBIT (ANIMBIT | CONDBIT | BURNBIT)
00221 #define REGBIT (CONDBIT | BURNBIT)
00222 
00223 void Micropolis::setSmoke(const Position &pos, bool zonePower)
00224 {
00225     static bool aniThis[8] = {  true, false, true, true, false, false, true, true };
00226     static short dx1[8]     = {   -1,    0,    1,    0,    0,    0,    0,    1 };
00227     static short dy1[8]     = {   -1,    0,   -1,   -1,    0,    0,   -1,   -1 };
00228     static short aniTabA[8] = {    0,    0,   32,   40,    0,    0,   48,   56 };
00229     static short aniTabB[8] = {    0,    0,   36,   44,    0,    0,   52,   60 };
00230     static short aniTabC[8] = { IND1,    0, IND2, IND4,    0,    0, IND6, IND8 };
00231     static short aniTabD[8] = { IND1,    0, IND3, IND5,    0,    0, IND7, IND9 };
00232 
00233     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00234 
00235     if (tile < IZB) {
00236         return;
00237     }
00238 
00239     int z = (tile - IZB) >>3; 
00240     z = z & 7;
00241 
00242     if (aniThis[z]) {
00243         int xx = pos.posX + dx1[z];
00244         int yy = pos.posY + dy1[z];
00245 
00246         if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00247 
00248             if (zonePower) {
00249 
00252                 if ((map[xx][yy] & LOMASK) == aniTabC[z]) {
00253                     map[xx][yy] = ASCBIT | (SMOKEBASE + aniTabA[z]);
00254                     map[xx][yy] = ASCBIT | (SMOKEBASE + aniTabB[z]);
00255                 }
00256 
00257             } else {
00258 
00260                 if ((map[xx][yy] & LOMASK) > aniTabC[z]) {
00261                   map[xx][yy] = REGBIT | aniTabC[z];
00262                   map[xx][yy] = REGBIT | aniTabD[z];
00263                 }
00264 
00265             }
00266 
00267         }
00268 
00269     }
00270 
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00278 void Micropolis::makeHospital(const Position &pos)
00279 {
00280     if (needHospital > 0) {
00281         zonePlop(pos, HOSPITAL - 4);
00282         needHospital = 0;
00283         return;
00284     }
00285 
00286     if (needChurch > 0) {
00287         int churchType = getRandom(7); // 0 to 7 inclusive
00288         int tile;
00289         if (churchType == 0) {
00290             tile = CHURCH0;
00291         } else {
00292             tile = CHURCH1 + ((churchType - 1) * 9);
00293         }
00294 
00295        //printf("NEW CHURCH tile %d x %d y %d type %d\n", tile, pos.posX, pos.posY, churchType);
00296 
00297         zonePlop(pos, tile - 4);
00298         needChurch = 0;
00299         return;
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00309 short Micropolis::getLandPollutionValue(const Position &pos)
00310 {
00311     short landVal;
00312 
00313     landVal =  landValueMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00314     landVal -= pollutionDensityMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00315 
00316     if (landVal < 30) {
00317         return 0;
00318     }
00319 
00320     if (landVal < 80) {
00321         return 1;
00322     }
00323 
00324     if (landVal < 150) {
00325         return 2;
00326     }
00327 
00328     return 3;
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00337 void Micropolis::incRateOfGrowth(const Position &pos, int amount)
00338 {
00339     int value = rateOfGrowthMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00340 
00341     value = clamp(value + amount * 4, -200, 200);
00342     rateOfGrowthMap.worldSet(pos.posX, pos.posY, value);
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00352 bool Micropolis::zonePlop(const Position &pos, int base)
00353 {
00354     short z, x;
00355     static const short Zx[9] = {-1, 0, 1,-1, 0, 1,-1, 0, 1};
00356     static const short Zy[9] = {-1,-1,-1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1};
00357 
00358     for (z = 0; z < 9; z++) {             /* check for fire  */
00359         int xx = pos.posX + Zx[z];
00360         int yy = pos.posY + Zy[z];
00361 
00362         if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00363             x = map[xx][yy] & LOMASK;
00364 
00365             if ((x >= FLOOD) && (x < ROADBASE)) {
00366                 return false;
00367             }
00368 
00369         }
00370 
00371     }
00372 
00373     for (z = 0; z < 9; z++) {
00374         int xx = pos.posX + Zx[z];
00375         int yy = pos.posY + Zy[z];
00376 
00377         if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00378             map[xx][yy] = base + BNCNBIT;
00379         }
00380 
00381         base++;
00382     }
00383 
00384     setZonePower(pos);
00385     map[pos.posX][pos.posY] |= ZONEBIT + BULLBIT;
00386 
00387     return true;
00388 }
00389 
00395 short Micropolis::doFreePop(const Position &pos)
00396 {
00397     short count = 0;
00398 
00399     for (short x = pos.posX - 1; x <= pos.posX + 1; x++) {
00400         for (short y = pos.posY - 1; y <= pos.posY + 1; y++) {
00401             if (x >= 0 && x < WORLD_W && y >= 0 && y < WORLD_H) {
00402                 MapTile tile = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00403                 if (tile >= LHTHR && tile <= HHTHR) {
00404                     count++;
00405                 }
00406             }
00407         }
00408     }
00409 
00410     return count;
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00419 bool Micropolis::setZonePower(const Position &pos)
00420 {
00421     MapValue mapValue = map[pos.posX][pos.posY];
00422     MapTile tile = mapValue & LOMASK;
00423 
00424     if (tile == NUCLEAR || tile == POWERPLANT) {
00425         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = mapValue | PWRBIT;
00426         return true;
00427     }
00428 
00429     if (powerGridMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY)) {
00430         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = mapValue | PWRBIT;
00431         return true;
00432     } else {
00433         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = mapValue & (~PWRBIT);
00434         return false;
00435     }
00436 }
00437 
00438 
00445 void Micropolis::buildHouse(const Position &pos, int value)
00446 {
00447     short z, score, hscore, BestLoc;
00448     static short ZeX[9] = { 0,-1, 0, 1,-1, 1,-1, 0, 1};
00449     static short ZeY[9] = { 0,-1,-1,-1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1};
00450 
00451     BestLoc = 0;
00452     hscore = 0;
00453 
00454     for (z = 1; z < 9; z++) {
00455         int xx = pos.posX + ZeX[z];
00456         int yy = pos.posY + ZeY[z];
00457 
00458         if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00459 
00460             score = evalLot(xx, yy);
00461 
00463             if (score != 0) {
00464 
00465                 if (score > hscore) {
00466                     hscore = score;
00467                     BestLoc = z;
00468                 }
00469 
00472                 //        trigger this code too.
00473                 if (score == hscore && !(getRandom16() & 7)) {
00474                     BestLoc = z;
00475                 }
00476 
00477             }
00478 
00479         }
00480 
00481     }
00482 
00483     if (BestLoc) {
00484         int xx = pos.posX + ZeX[BestLoc];
00485         int yy = pos.posY + ZeY[BestLoc];
00486 
00487         if (testBounds(xx, yy)) {
00489             map[xx][yy] = HOUSE + BLBNCNBIT + getRandom(2) + value * 3;
00490         }
00491 
00492     }
00493 }
00494 
00495 
00500 short Micropolis::evalLot(int x, int y)
00501 {
00502     short z, score;
00503     static short DX[4] = { 0, 1, 0,-1};
00504     static short DY[4] = {-1, 0, 1, 0};
00505 
00506     /* test for clear lot */
00507     z = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00508 
00509     if (z && (z < RESBASE || z > RESBASE + 8)) {
00510         return -1;
00511     }
00512 
00513     score = 1;
00514 
00515     for (z = 0; z < 4; z++) {
00516         int xx = x + DX[z];
00517         int yy = y + DY[z];
00518 
00519         if (testBounds(xx, yy) &&
00520             map[xx][yy] != DIRT && (map[xx][yy] & LOMASK) <= LASTROAD) {
00521             score++;          /* look for road */
00522         }
00523 
00524     }
00525 
00526     return score;
00527 }
00528 
00534 void Micropolis::doResidential(const Position &pos, bool zonePower)
00535 {
00536     short tpop, zscore, locvalve, value, TrfGood;
00537 
00538     resZonePop++;
00539 
00540     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00541 
00542     if (tile == FREEZ) {
00543         tpop = doFreePop(pos);
00544     } else {
00545         tpop = getResZonePop(tile);
00546     }
00547 
00548     resPop += tpop;
00549 
00550     if (tpop > getRandom(35)) {
00551         /* Try driving from residential to commercial */
00552         TrfGood = makeTraffic(pos, ZT_COMMERCIAL);
00553     } else {
00554         TrfGood = 1;
00555     }
00556 
00557     if (TrfGood == -1) {
00558         value = getLandPollutionValue(pos);
00559         doResOut(pos, tpop, value);
00560         return;
00561     }
00562 
00563     if (tile == FREEZ || !(getRandom16() & 7)) {
00564 
00565         locvalve = evalRes(pos, TrfGood);
00566         zscore = resValve + locvalve;
00567 
00568         if (!zonePower) {
00569             zscore = -500;
00570         }
00571 
00572         if (zscore > -350 &&
00573             ((short)(zscore - 26380) > ((short)getRandom16Signed()))) {
00574 
00575             if (!tpop && !(getRandom16() & 3)) {
00576                 makeHospital(pos);
00577                 return;
00578             }
00579 
00580             value = getLandPollutionValue(pos);
00581             doResIn(pos, tpop, value);
00582             return;
00583         }
00584 
00585         if (zscore < 350 &&
00586             (((short)(zscore + 26380)) < ((short)getRandom16Signed()))) {
00587             value = getLandPollutionValue(pos);
00588             doResOut(pos, tpop, value);
00589         }
00590     }
00591 }
00592 
00593 
00600 void Micropolis::doResIn(const Position &pos, int pop, int value)
00601 {
00602     short pollution = pollutionDensityMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00603 
00604     if (pollution > 128) {
00605         return;
00606     }
00607 
00608     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00609 
00610     if (tile == FREEZ) {
00611 
00612         if (pop < 8) {
00613             buildHouse(pos, value);
00614             incRateOfGrowth(pos, 1);
00615             return;
00616         }
00617 
00618         if (populationDensityMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY) > 64) {
00619             resPlop(pos, 0, value);
00620             incRateOfGrowth(pos, 8);
00621             return;
00622         }
00623 
00624         return;
00625     }
00626 
00627     if (pop < 40) {
00628         resPlop(pos, (pop / 8) - 1, value);
00629         incRateOfGrowth(pos, 8);
00630     }
00631 
00632 }
00633 
00634 
00641 void Micropolis::doResOut(const Position &pos, int pop, int value)
00642 {
00643     static short Brdr[9] = {0,3,6,1,4,7,2,5,8};
00644     short x, y, loc, z;
00645 
00646     if (!pop) {
00647         return;
00648     }
00649 
00650     if (pop > 16) {
00651         resPlop(pos, (pop - 24) / 8, value);
00652         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -8);
00653         return;
00654     }
00655 
00656     if (pop == 16) {
00657         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -8);
00658         map[pos.posX][pos.posY] = (FREEZ | BLBNCNBIT | ZONEBIT);
00659         for (x = pos.posX - 1; x <= pos.posX + 1; x++) {
00660             for (y = pos.posY - 1; y <= pos.posY + 1; y++) {
00661                 if (testBounds(x, y)) {
00662                     if ((map[x][y] & LOMASK) != FREEZ) {
00663                         map[x][y] = LHTHR + value + getRandom(2) + BLBNCNBIT;
00664                     }
00665                 }
00666             }
00667         }
00668     }
00669 
00670     if (pop < 16) {
00671         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -1);
00672         z = 0;
00673         for (x = pos.posX - 1; x <= pos.posX + 1; x++) {
00674             for (y = pos.posY - 1; y <= pos.posY + 1; y++) {
00675                 if (testBounds(x, y)) {
00676                     loc = map[x][y] & LOMASK;
00677                     if ((loc >= LHTHR) && (loc <= HHTHR)) {
00678                         map[x][y] = Brdr[z] + BLBNCNBIT + FREEZ - 4;
00679                         return;
00680                     }
00681                 }
00682                 z++;
00683             }
00684         }
00685     }
00686 }
00687 
00688 
00697 short Micropolis::getResZonePop(MapTile mapTile)
00698 {
00699     short CzDen = ((mapTile - RZB) / 9) % 4;
00700 
00701     return CzDen * 8 + 16;
00702 }
00703 
00710 void Micropolis::resPlop(const Position &pos, int den, int value)
00711 {
00712     short base;
00713 
00714     base = ((value * 4 + den) * 9) + RZB - 4;
00715     zonePlop(pos, base);
00716 }
00717 
00718 
00722 short Micropolis::evalRes(const Position &pos, int traf)
00723 {
00724     short value;
00725 
00726     if (traf < 0) {
00727         return -3000;
00728     }
00729 
00730     value =  landValueMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00731     value -= pollutionDensityMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00732 
00733     if (value < 0) {
00734         value = 0;          /* Cap at 0 */
00735     } else {
00736         value = min(value * 32, 6000); /* Cap at 6000 */
00737     }
00738 
00739     value = value - 3000;
00740 
00741     return value;
00742 }
00743 
00744 
00751 void Micropolis::doCommercial(const Position &pos, bool zonePower)
00752 {
00753     short tpop, TrfGood;
00754     short zscore, locvalve, value;
00755 
00756     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00757 
00758     comZonePop++;
00759     tpop = getComZonePop(tile);
00760     comPop += tpop;
00761 
00762     if (tpop > getRandom(5)) {
00763         /* Try driving from commercial to industrial */
00764         TrfGood = makeTraffic(pos, ZT_INDUSTRIAL);
00765     } else {
00766         TrfGood = 1;
00767     }
00768 
00769     if (TrfGood == -1) {
00770         value = getLandPollutionValue(pos);
00771         doComOut(pos, tpop, value);
00772         return;
00773     }
00774 
00775     if (!(getRandom16() & 7)) {
00776 
00777         locvalve = evalCom(pos, TrfGood);
00778         zscore = comValve + locvalve;
00779 
00780         if (!zonePower) {
00781             zscore = -500;
00782         }
00783 
00784         if (TrfGood &&
00785             (zscore > -350) &&
00786             (((short)(zscore - 26380)) > ((short)getRandom16Signed()))) {
00787             value = getLandPollutionValue(pos);
00788             doComIn(pos, tpop, value);
00789             return;
00790         }
00791 
00792         if ((zscore < 350) &&
00793             (((short)(zscore + 26380)) < ((short)getRandom16Signed()))) {
00794             value = getLandPollutionValue(pos);
00795             doComOut(pos, tpop, value);
00796         }
00797 
00798     }
00799 
00800 }
00801 
00802 
00809 void Micropolis::doComIn(const Position &pos, int pop, int value)
00810 {
00811     short z;
00812 
00813     z = landValueMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00814     z = z >>5;
00815 
00816     if (pop > z) {
00817         return;
00818     }
00819 
00820     if (pop < 5) {
00821         comPlop(pos, pop, value);
00822         incRateOfGrowth(pos, 8);
00823     }
00824 }
00825 
00832 void Micropolis::doComOut(const Position &pos, int pop, int value)
00833 {
00834     if (pop > 1) {
00835         comPlop(pos, pop - 2, value);
00836         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -8);
00837         return;
00838     }
00839 
00840     if (pop == 1) {
00841         zonePlop(pos, COMBASE);
00842         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -8);
00843     }
00844 }
00845 
00846 
00852 short Micropolis::getComZonePop(MapTile tile)
00853 {
00854     if (tile == COMCLR) {
00855         return 0;
00856     }
00857 
00858     short CzDen = ((tile - CZB) / 9) % 5 + 1;
00859     return CzDen;
00860 }
00861 
00862 
00869 void Micropolis::comPlop(const Position &pos, int Den, int Value)
00870 {
00871     short base;
00872 
00873     base = ((Value * 5) + Den) * 9 + CZB - 4;
00874     zonePlop(pos, base);
00875 }
00876 
00877 
00883 short Micropolis::evalCom(const Position &pos, int traf)
00884 {
00885     short Value;
00886 
00887     if (traf < 0) {
00888         return -3000;
00889     }
00890 
00891     Value = comRateMap.worldGet(pos.posX, pos.posY);
00892 
00893     return Value;
00894 }
00895 
00896 
00903 void Micropolis::doIndustrial(const Position &pos, bool zonePower)
00904 {
00905     short tpop, zscore, TrfGood;
00906 
00907     MapTile tile = map[pos.posX][pos.posY] & LOMASK;
00908 
00909     indZonePop++;
00910     setSmoke(pos, zonePower);
00911     tpop = getIndZonePop(tile);
00912     indPop += tpop;
00913 
00914     if (tpop > getRandom(5)) {
00915         /* Try driving from industrial to residential */
00916         TrfGood = makeTraffic(pos, ZT_RESIDENTIAL);
00917     } else {
00918         TrfGood = 1;
00919     }
00920 
00921     if (TrfGood == -1) {
00922         doIndOut(pos, tpop, getRandom16() & 1);
00923         return;
00924     }
00925 
00926     if (!(getRandom16() & 7)) {
00927         zscore = indValve + evalInd(TrfGood);
00928 
00929         if (!zonePower) {
00930             zscore = -500;
00931         }
00932 
00933         if (zscore > -350 &&
00934             (((short)(zscore - 26380)) > ((short)getRandom16Signed()))) {
00935             doIndIn(pos, tpop, getRandom16() & 1);
00936             return;
00937         }
00938 
00939         if (zscore < 350 &&
00940             (((short)(zscore + 26380)) < ((short)getRandom16Signed()))) {
00941             doIndOut(pos, tpop, getRandom16() & 1);
00942         }
00943     }
00944 }
00945 
00946 
00953 void Micropolis::doIndIn(const Position &pos, int pop, int value)
00954 {
00955     if (pop < 4) {
00956         indPlop(pos, pop, value);
00957         incRateOfGrowth(pos, 8);
00958     }
00959 }
00960 
00967 void Micropolis::doIndOut(const Position &pos, int pop, int value)
00968 {
00969     if (pop > 1) {
00970         indPlop(pos, pop - 2, value);
00971         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -8);
00972         return;
00973     }
00974 
00975     if (pop == 1) {
00976         zonePlop(pos, INDBASE); // empty industrial zone
00977         incRateOfGrowth(pos, -8);
00978     }
00979 }
00980 
00981 
00987 short Micropolis::getIndZonePop(MapTile tile)
00988 {
00989     if (tile == INDCLR) {
00990         return 0;
00991     }
00992 
00993     short CzDen = (((tile - IZB) / 9) % 4) + 1;
00994     return CzDen;
00995 }
00996 
01003 void Micropolis::indPlop(const Position &pos, int den, int value)
01004 {
01005     short base = ((value * 4) + den) * 9 + IND1;
01006     zonePlop(pos, base);
01007 }
01008 
01009 
01015 short Micropolis::evalInd(int traf)
01016 {
01017     if (traf < 0) {
01018         return -1000;
01019     }
01020 
01021     return 0;
01022 }
